https://www.furaffinity.net/view/12940458/
约稿用户主页：https://www.furaffinity.net/user/sjviper/
画师主页：https://www.furaffinity.net/user/huckleberry
这组图我收藏了超过十年，最开始还是在一个叫tentaclerape的网站搜到的，FA站上无论是约稿者还是画师都已多年未更新，e621搜索能找到在“Lodigrar”tag下有2023年的同题材约稿，其余搜索尚无收获。很好奇作者近年是否更换ID继续从事绘画，如有知情请评论区告知，感谢。
I've had these images for over 10 years. I first found it on tentaclerape.net. Neither the commissioners nor the artists on Furaffinity.net have updated their work for years. A search using e621 yielded a commission from 2023 under the tag "Lodigrar" but other searches yielded nothing. I'm curious whether the artist has changed their ID and continued drawing in recent years. If you know anything, please let me know in the comments. Thank you.
